titles.title: Seventeenth Sunday in Ordinary Time Year C Psalms

properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
On the day I called,
you answered me, O Lord.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I thank you, Lord,
with all my heart;
you have heard the words
of my mouth.
In the presence of the angels
I praise you.
I bow down towards your
holy temple.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I give thanks to your name
for your merciful love
and your faithfulness.
You have exalted your name
and your promise over all.
On the day I called,
you answered me; you increased
the strength of my soul.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The Lords is high,
yet he looks on the lowly,
and the haughty
he knows from afar.
You give me life though
I walk amid affliction;
you stretch out your hand
against the anger of my foes.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
With your right hand
you save me;
the Lords will accomplish
this is for me. O Lord,
your merciful love is eternal,
discard not the work
of your hands.
